name: whoseturnisit
0:
”Alexa ask whose turn is it to take out the trash”
”Alexa ask whose turn who is on my list”
”Alexa ask whose turn to add person Joe”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: whose turn
des:
Add and manage a list of names and ask Alexa whose turn it is to do something.

"Alexa ask whose turn to add name Joe"
"Alexa ask whose turn to remove name Bob"
"Alexa ask whose turn who is on my list"
"Alexa ask whose turn is it to take out the trash"
"Alexa ask whose turn is it to pay the bill"
